medium: Drypoint and collaged aquatint, lithograph, pastel and graphite
title: Fold-Out
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, annotated LR: [John Newman 1985 (obscure)/Working Proof/Firs
description: Sculptural abstraction featuring an elliptical red and orange object that fills most of the picture plane; a circle in its center consists of interweaving yellow lines; heavier lines around the object\'s center spiral outwards towards its border; a chain-like, turquoise design adorns background
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
